remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 C# 中，此属性是 类的索引器。In C#, this property is the indexer for the class. 在 JScript 中，可以使用某个类型定义的默认索引属性，但不能显式定义你自己。In JScript, you can use the default indexed properties defined by a type, but you cannot explicitly define your own. 但是，在类上指定 expando 属性会自动提供默认索引属性，类型为 Object 且其索引类型为。However, specifying the expando attribute on a class automatically provides a default indexed property whose type is Object and whose index type is .

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对 的访问（线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果对 的访问是同步的（线程安全），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回一个对象，该对象可用于同步对 的访问。 returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the . 中的大多数集合类命名空间还实现提供同步的包装基础集合已同步方法。Most collection classes in the namespace also implement a Synchronized method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. [Visual Basic 中， C#][Visual Basic, C#] 下面的示例演示如何锁定集合使用在整个枚举期间：The following example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: ```csharp ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ```

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object Implements ICollection.SyncRoot

summary.span: 获取可用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 可用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有基础存储区的集合不是公开提供，预期的实现是返回当前实例。For collections with an underlying store is not publicly available, the expected implementation is to return the current instance. 请注意当前实例的指针可能足以满足自动换行; 的其他集合的集合这些集合应返回基础集合`SyncRoot`属性。Note that the pointer to the current instance might not be sufficient for collections that wrap other collections; those should return the underlying collection's `SyncRoot` property. 命名空间中的大多数集合类也实现 `Synchronized` 方法，该方法对基础集合提供同步的包装。Most collection classes in the namespace also implement a `Synchronized` method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection. 不过，派生类可使用 属性来提供各自的同步版本的集合。However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the property. 同步代码必须在执行操作的不是直接对集合的集合。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the collection, not directly on the collection. 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体地说，这样可与可能同时对集合实例进行修改的其他线程保持正确的同步。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection instance. 如果没有`Synchronized`方法对集合的预期使用情况如下所示：In the absence of a `Synchronized` method on a collection, the expected usage for looks like this: ```csharp ICollection MyCollection =... lock(MyCollection.SyncRoot) { // Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. } ``` ```vb Dim myCollection as New ICollection() SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot ' Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. End SyncLock ``` 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. [Visual Basic 中， C#][Visual Basic, C#] 下面的示例演示如何锁定集合使用在整个枚举期间：The following example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: ```csharp ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ```

span.span: if the value is found in the list, otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，此方法使用等号和 CompareTo 方法，以确定是否有项集合中的对象的存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the Equals and CompareTo methods of the objects in the collection to determine whether item exists. 在.NET Framework 早期版本，此决定可能由使用等号和 CompareTo 方法的集合中的对象上的项参数。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the Equals and CompareTo methods of the item parameter on the objects in the collection.

returns.span: 如果在列表中找到，则为 的索引；否则为 -1。

span.span: The index of if found in the list; otherwise, -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，此方法使用等号和 CompareTo 方法，以确定是否有项集合中的对象的存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the Equals and CompareTo methods of the objects in the collection to determine whether item exists. 在.NET Framework 早期版本，此决定可能由使用等号和 CompareTo 方法的集合中的对象上的项参数。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the Equals and CompareTo methods of the item parameter on the objects in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Collections.IList.Insert(int32 index, object value) cil managed
Sub Insert (index As Integer, value As Object) Implements IList.Insert
virtual void System.Collections.IList.Insert(int index, System::Object ^ value) = System::Collections::IList::Insert;

param.name: index
param.span: 应将值插入到的位置的索引（从零开始）。

span.span: The zero-based index at which value should be inserted.

param.name: value
param.span: 要插入到列表中的项。

span.span: The item to insert into the list.

summary.span: 将某项插入列表中指定的索引处。

span.span: Inserts an item to the list at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`index`等于的项数在列表中，则*值*追加到末尾。If `index` equals the number of items in the list, then *value* is appended to the end. 在由连续的元素组成的集合（如列表）中，已移除元素下面的元素将上移以占据空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsFixedSize As Boolean Implements IList.IsFixedSize

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否具有固定大小。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the has a fixed size.

value.span: 如果 具有固定大小，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the has a fixed size; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合在创建之后不能再添加或移除元素，但是允许修改现有元素。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements.

value.span: 如果 是只读的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is read-only; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在由连续的元素组成的集合（如列表）中，已移除元素下面的元素将上移以占据空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
